mapper.select: select c1.cat_id as `one`, c2.cat_id as `two`, c3.cat_id as `three` from `category` c3 left join `category` c2 on c3.`parent_cat_id` = c2.`cat_id` left join `category` c1 on c2.`parent_cat_id` = c1.`cat_id` where c3.`cat_id` = #{id}
select `cat_id` as `value`, `cat_name` as `label` from `category` where `parent_cat_id` = 0 order by sort
select `cat_id` as `value`, `cat_name` as `label` from `category` where `parent_cat_id` = #{one} order by sort
select `cat_id` as `value`, `cat_name` as `label` from `category` where `parent_cat_id` = #{two} order by sort
